resources.string: Top Brand Luxury Watches For \nMen And Women
Step Into The Universe Of Watches
search bar with notification and messages icons

The Rolex Day-Date, often called \"The President\'s Watch,\" is a symbol of unparalleled prestige. Exclusively crafted from 18 ct gold (yellow, white, or Everose) or 950 platinum, its robust Oyster case houses a Superlative Chronometer mechanical movement (like Calibre 3255), ensuring exceptional precision and a 70-hour power reserve. It displays the day and date instantly. The distinctive President bracelet, made from matching precious metal, offers ultimate comfort with its concealed Crownclasp. Dials come in a wide array of colors and finishes, from classic champagne, white, and black, to vibrant green, blue, pink, and even meteorite or unique stone options.

The vibrant, high saturation red of the LCD really pops against the black bezel, band, and dial, not only enhancing visibility but also pushing the envelope of daring design.

Activate the backlight to light up the digital display for even better visibility. 

Make a unique statement in all black, with a touch of bold red

The Rolex GMT-Master II (Model 126713GRNR) is a perfect fusion of luxury, precision, and functionality. Crafted from Rolex’s distinctive Yellow Rolesor—a blend of 18K yellow gold and stainless steel—this 40mm timepiece exudes timeless elegance. The black dial with luminous hour markers ensures excellent legibility, day or night.

Born in 1948, the Seamaster collection possess an exquisite range of timepiece designs, each with their own distinct style and purpose. From the classic elegance of the Aqua Terra to the ingenious functionality of the Diver 300M, there is a model to suit every taste and need. Celebrated for their exceptional craftsmanship and innovative technology, these watches have earned their place among the most popular in the world.

Experience the epitome of precision and elegance with Roamer's Pro Chrono timepiece. Meticulously crafted, the watch features a robust 43.5MM stainless steel case and a Swiss-made quartz movement, ensuring reliable performance. With 10 ATM water resistance and superluminal accents, this chronograph watch guarantees accuracy and readability, even in low-light conditions. "

CASE SIZE 42nRound BAND COLOR DIAL DIAL COLOR Green TYPE Analog CRYSTAL Scratch Resistant Sapphire HANDS around the inner ri- 60 Second,Date display between 4 and 5 o\'clock position , Chronograph, Date,Hour, Minute, Second, Solar-powered

The SRZ552P1 watch is the perfect complement to any casual outfit, with its pure case shape and textured dial. This stainless steel watch is adorned with a gold coating and diamond hour markers for a chic and glamorous look. Elegant and robust, the watch is water-resistant to 5 bar and has a sapphire crystal glass.The white of the mother-of-pearl dial and the gold case and strap of this watch come together beautifully to create an elegant timepiece with a striking appearance on the wrist. The hands, which are also golden, are powered by a Seiko quartz movement for exceptional precision.

Experience the perfect fusion of functionality and style with Casio’s CAS5 chronograph. Engineered with precision, this timepiece boasts a bold 44mm resin case paired with a scratch-resistant mineral glass display, making it ideal for both urban adventures and rugged outings. Powered by a Japanese quartz movement, the CAS5 ensures pinpoint accuracy day after day. With 100-meter water resistance and an LED backlight for enhanced visibility, this watch offers unmatched durability and clarity—no matter the environment.

A refined 39 mm 316L stainless steel case, featuring brushed flanks and a polished bezel, only 11.1 mm thick. Topped with a domed, anti‑reflective sapphire crystal and a see‑through caseback. Water-resistant to 50 mMovement\nPowered by a COSC-certified ETA 2824‑2 automatic calibre—operating at 4 Hz, offering a 38 h power reserve and accuracy between –4/+6 s/day Dial & Aesthetics\nVintage-inspired matte dials in salmon or anthracite, with embossed Arabic numerals, railroad minute track, leaf hands, and classic Tissot logo. Elegantly signed \"Chronometre.\"

Seiko and Italdesign celebrates a tradition by taking reference from the 1996 Macchina Sportiva (as Italians call the sports car) styles! One of the funkiest watches born out of the collaboration ever, it’s an edition created especially in blue and bright orange highlights. Reflects the automobile influences behind Giugiaro Design creations and the results of the collaboration between two phenomenal brands.Stainless Steel Case Silicone Strap Solar Movement Caliber: V176 Sapphire Crystal Black Dial Analog Display Tachymeter Scale Chronograph Function Luminous Hands And Markers Date Display Overcharge .

Lung-busting climbs in the Alps and Pyrenees, thrilling sprints, stunning tales of human exceptionalism... when Le Tour de France gets underway in July, millions of people around the world will be inspired. And the Tissot T Race Cycling 2022 Tour de France Special Edition is the perfect watch for them, bringing together Swiss precision and reliability with a classic design inspired by racing bikes. With the race logo engraved on the caseback and iconic yellow trim on the second hands and crowns, wearing this watch will bring you closer to the glory in France.SKU T1354173705100 Weight 105 Collections.
